com.sonic.as_storage_java
Class Audio

java.lang.Object
  com.sonic.as_storage_java.Volume
      com.sonic.as_storage_java.Format
          com.sonic.as_storage_java.Audio

public class Audio
extends Format

This class manages all of the audio related functions.

Author:
vijaya_lashkari

Constructor Detail

Audio

public Audio(Format format)
Method Detail

Format_AddAudioTrackFromFile

public int Format_AddAudioTrackFromFile(java.lang.String filePath,
                                        Audio.FileType filetype)
DESCRIPTION: Add an audio track to media from a file. Returns the one-based track number representing the file in the 'track' parameter.

Parameters:
filePath - fullPath to file to add as an audio track
filetype - type of file adding as an audio track
Returns:
StorageError.None - ok
StorageError.InvalidParameter - if one or more of the parameters are invalid

Format_AddAudioTrackFromStream

public int Format_AddAudioTrackFromStream(long streamLength,
                                          AS_Storage_EventListener.VolumeEventListener callback,
                                          java.lang.Object callerUse,
                                          Audio.FileType fileType)
DESCRIPTION: Add an audio track to media from a stream. Returns the one-based track number representing the file in the 'track' parameter. The AS_Audio::FileType must be specified for stream data. Currently only AS_Audio::File_PCM is supported.

Returns:
StorageError.None - ok
StorageError.InvalidParameter - if one or more of the parameters are invalid

Format_SetAudioTrackProperty

public int Format_SetAudioTrackProperty(Audio.Track_Property prop,
                                        int trackNumber,
                                        int propSize,
                                        java.lang.Object propData)
DESCRIPTION: Set an AS_Audio::Track_Property for the given track number.

Returns:
StorageError.None - ok
StorageError.InvalidParameter - if one or more of the parameters are invalid

Format_AddAudioTrackEffect

public int Format_AddAudioTrackEffect(int trackNumber,
                                      Audio.EffectType type,
                                      int parametersSize,
                                      java.lang.Object[] parameters)
DESCRIPTION: Add an AS_Audio::EffectType effect to the specified track number.

Returns:
StorageError.None - ok
StorageError.InvalidParameter - if one or more of the parameters are invalid

Format_ExtractAudioTrackToFile

public int Format_ExtractAudioTrackToFile(int trackNumber,
                                          java.lang.String fullPath,
                                          int flags,
                                          int startOffset,
                                          int length,
                                          Audio.Track_Tags tags,
                                          Audio.Track_EncoderSettings encode,
                                          AS_Storage_EventListener.VolumeEventListener callback,
                                          java.lang.Object userData)
DESCRIPTION: Extracts a track from the audio CD to a file with the given path.

Returns:
StorageError.None - ok
StorageError.InvalidParameter - if track number does not exist - if the specified path is not valid - if the flags are incorrect - if the startOffset and/or length exceed the length of the track
